457561ae-e4cf-452e-8601-83fc58756e85.__data__:
{"id_":"457561ae-e4cf-452e-8601-83fc58756e85","metadata":{"url":"https://www.docs.parcel.gobolt.com/"},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{},"text":"GoBolt - Parcel API Documentation









AuthenticationService Accounts & TokenspostCreate Service AccountpostRequest Access TokenRatespostRetrieve RatesOrderspostCreate a New OrdergetGet multiple ordersgetGet Order by IddelDelete Order by IdputUpdate the packages in an order.patchMark order as ready for pickup.TrackinggetGet the tracking information of an order by order id or package tracking number.LabelsgetRetrieve LabelsAPI docs by RedoclyGoBolt Parcel (v1)Welcome to the GoBolt Parcel API Documentation. You can use the GoBolt API to requests rates, create an order, delete an order, retrieve a shipping label.
AuthenticationThe GoBolt Parcel APIs use the OAuth 2.0 protocol for authentication and authorization. GoBolt supports the client credentials grant type for Oauth 2.0 
Before authenticating with the APIs listed in this document, you must have a GoBolt Parcel user account created with your email and password.
Basic Steps
All applications follow a basic pattern when accessing a GoBolt Parcel API using OAuth 2.0. At a high level, you will follow four steps:
1. Create a. OAuth 2.0 Service User
A service user is a special type of GoBolt user intended to represent a non-human user that needs to authenticate and be authorized to access data in GoBolt Parcel APIs.
It is crucial that you use a service user account to access GoBolt Parcel APIs in your client applications. This way, your GoBolt Parcel integration will be protected from changes in your user accounts such as password resets or account deactivations.
In this step, you will exchange your user account credentials (email & password) for service account credentials. There are two ways of doing so:

Using the Create A Service Account API
Using the GoBolt Parcel Portal

2. Use your service user to obtain an access token
Next, to access GoBolt Parcel APIs, your client application must use a service account created in Step 1 to obtain an access_token. By calling the Request Access Token API, you will be able to exchange your service account's client_id (username) and client_secret(password) for a token.
3. Send the access token to our APIs
Once your application has received an access-token, it needs to send the token in every subsequent API request in an HTTP Authorization request header
4. Refresh the access token, if necessary.
Access tokens have limited lifetimes. If your application needs access to a GoBolt Parcel endpoint beyond the lifetime of a single access token, it can obtain a refresh token. A refresh token allows your application to obtain new access tokens.
Service Accounts & TokensEverything about authentication for making API requests
Create Service Account Use your admin token to create a service account in order to use our api
Authorizations:NoneAuthorization-HeaderResponses200 Successful Response
post/users/serviceDevelopment/Staging environment
https://api-parcel-stage.gobolt.com/users/serviceProduction Environment
https://api-parcel.gobolt.com/users/service Response samples 200Content typeapplication/jsonCopy{"username": "user-service-account-test","password": "userpassword"}Request Access Token Exchange the client_id(username) and client_secret(password) of a service account for an access_token.
Request Body schema: application/jsonrequiredclient_idstring The client_id (username) for the account the access token is being request for. This value is required if you are requesting an access token.
client_secretstring The client_secret (password) for the account the auth token is being request for. This value is required only if you are requesting an access token.
grant_typestring The Oauth 2.0 grant type that is being requested. Value must be client_credentials. This value is always required.
refresh_tokenstring The refresh token previously issued to the client. This value is required only if you are refreshing an access token.
Responses200 Successful Response
post/oauth/tokenDevelopment/Staging environment
https://api-parcel-stage.gobolt.com/oauth/tokenProduction Environment
https://api-parcel.gobolt.com/oauth/token Request samples PayloadContent typeapplication/jsonCopy{"client_id": "user-service-account-test","client_secret": "userpassword","grant_type": "client_credentials","refresh_token": "DAV-aS9rquszIiQZqpZ8GCfMl"} Response samples 200Content typeapplication/jsonCopy{"access_token": "eyJjdHkiOiJKV1QiLCJlbmMiO","token_type": "Bearer","expires_in": 3600,"refresh_token": "xzzf-j_37pZmRW2SixZPzCVC8aGo21U5"}RatesEverything about shipping rates
Retrieve Rates This endpoint retrieves a list of all the shipping rates for a given potential order in accordance to the pricing  structure established when creating your merchant organization. If either the origin postal code or destination postal code is not in GoBolt's serviceable area, the endpoint will return an empty list.
Authorizations:NoneAuthorization-HeaderRequest Body schema: application/jsonrequiredpostalCoderequiredstring The postal code of the recipient of the order
originPostalCodestring The origin postal code for the order. If this parameter is omitted, it will default to the pickup location set up in your merchant organization.
packagesArray of objects (Packages)  Array of packages which contains the package information for size and weight.
Responses200 post/ratesDevelopment/Staging environment
https://api-parcel-stage.gobolt.com/ratesProduction Environment
https://api-parcel.gobolt.com/rates Request samples PayloadContent typeapplication/jsonCopy Expand all  Collapse all {"postalCode": "H4X1Z5","originPostalCode": "H4R2A4","packages": [{"refNumber": "12345","trackingNumber": "ABCDEF011234","weightOptions": {"weight": 20,"unit": "lb"},"sizeOptions": {"length": 20,"width": 15,"height": 15,"unit": "inch"}}]} Response samples 200Content typeapplication/jsonCopy Expand all  Collapse all [{"price": 10,"service": "NEXTDAY","name": "GoBolt Next-Day Delivery","description": "Get your package the next opening day of the merchant (2019-10-30)","estimateDay": "2019-10-30","estimateFrom": "2019-10-30","estimateTo": "2019-10-30"},{"price": 10,"service": "FLEX","name": "GoBolt Flex Delivery","description": "Get your package within a flexible timeframe. (2024-04-04 to 2024-04-08)","estimateDay": "2024-04-04 to 2024-04-08","estimateFrom": "2024-04-04","estimateTo": "2024-04-08"},{"price": 12,"service": "SAMEDAY","name": "GoBolt Same-Day Delivery","description": "Get your package before the end of the day (2019-10-29)","estimateDay": "2019-10-29","estimateFrom": "2019-10-29","estimateTo": "2019-10-29"},{"price": 12,"service": "SCHEDULED","name": "GoBolt Scheduled Delivery","description": "Get your package in a 3h window within the next 2 weeks (2019-10-29 to 2019-11-11)","estimateDay": "2019-10-29 to 2019-11-11","estimateFrom": "2019-10-29","estimateTo": "2019-11-11"}]OrdersEverything about orders
Create a New Order This endpoint creates a new order to be delivered by GoBolt. This operation is treated as a long running task. As soon as your request is validated, you will receive a 200 OK response with the order id while processing continues in the background.
Authorizations:OAuth2Authorization-HeaderRequest Body schema: application/jsonrequiredrecipientrequiredobject (Recipient)  recipientAddressrequiredobject (Address)  originAddressrequiredobject (Address)  packageCountrequiredinteger <int32>  The number of separate packages to be delivered for this order, up to a maximum of 20.
servicestring Default:  "NEXTDAY" Enum: "NEXTDAY" "SAMEDAY" "SCHEDULED" "FLEX" "CUSTOMER_BOOKING"  The service of the order, which determines the price and speed of the delivery. CUSTOMER_BOOKING is the only applicable option for HEAVY orders.
deliveryServicestring Default:  "TO_THE_DOOR" Enum: "THRESHOLD" "TO_THE_DOOR" "WHITE_GLOVE" "ROOM_OF_CHOICE"  The delivery service of the order, which determines the level of service our staff provide when delivering the order. Mandatory when CUSTOMER_BOOKING service is selected.
notesstring Any notes related specifically to the destination address.
refNumberstring A reference number from your side that we can use to contact you about the order
merchantDisplayNamestring A display name that's going to be shown in the order's label
packagesrequiredArray of objects (Packages)  Array of packages which contains the package information for size and weight.
Responses200 post/ordersDevelopment/Staging environment
https://api-parcel-stage.gobolt.com/ordersProduction Environment
https://api-parcel.gobolt.com/orders Request samples PayloadContent typeapplication/jsonCopy Expand all  Collapse all {"recipient": {"name": "Charles Carmichael","phone": "+15145573849","email": "charles.carmichael@gobolt.com","notes": "Do not text, call instead."},"recipientAddress": {"street": "4455A Boul. Poirier","unit": "unit204 - GoBolt HQ","city": "Montreal","province": "Quebec","country": "Canada","postalCode": "H4R 2A4","isBusinessAddress": true},"originAddress": {"street": "4455A Boul. Poirier","unit": "unit204 - GoBolt HQ","city": "Montreal","province": "Quebec","country": "Canada","postalCode": "H4R 2A4","isBusinessAddress": true},"packageCount": 1,"service": "NEXTDAY","deliveryService": "THRESHOLD","notes": "The entrance is through the green fence on the left. If no answer, leave behind the black bin.","refNumber": "shopifyid1234","merchantDisplayName": "Metro Fleury No 2","packages": [{"refNumber": "12345","trackingNumber": "ABCDEF011234","weightOptions": {"weight": 20,"unit": "lb"},"sizeOptions": {"length": 20,"width": 15,"height": 15,"unit": "inch"}}]} Response samples 200Content typeapplication/jsonCopy Expand all  Collapse all {"id": "FF4F198RNMV5","packages": [{"trackingNumber": "RRRIPZUTSLVW","refNumber": "12345","status": "CARRIER_PICKED_UP","weightOptions": {"weight": 20,"unit": "lb"},"sizeOptions": {"length": 20,"width": 15,"height": 15,"unit": "inch"}}]}Get multiple orders This endpoint is doing a batch get all the orders associated with the service account
Authorizations:OAuth2Authorization-Headerquery Parameterslimitnumber Default:  100 The number of results to be retrieved per request.
startAtstring The last order ID in the query. Optional when making an initial request.
createdAtstring The date of creation of the last order in the query. Optional when making an initial request.
Responses200 get/ordersDevelopment/Staging environment
https://api-parcel-stage.gobolt.com/ordersProduction Environment
https://api-parcel.gobolt.com/orders Response samples 200Content typeapplication/jsonCopy Expand all  Collapse all {"orders": [{"id": "FF4F198RNMV5","createdAt": "2019-10-25T22:56:06.000Z","createdBy": "93e66b39-0uf8-40bb-742a-911235a09743","merchantId": "13e11b39-0uf8-40bb-742a-913125a09743","orderStatus": "GEOCODED","rateChoice": {"price": 5,"service": "SAMEDAY","deliveryService": "THRESHOLD"},"deliveryType": "PARCEL","validAddress": true,"recipient": {"name": "Charles Carmichael","phone": "+15145573849","email": "charles.carmichael@gobolt.com","notes": "Do not text, call instead."},"recipientAddress": {"number": 1234,"street": "Boul. Poirier","city": "Montreal","province": "Quebec","country": "Canada","postalCode": "H4R 2A4","sublocality": "Communauté-Urbaine-de-Montréal","location": {"lat": 45.4755722,"lng": -73.61911979999999}},"originAddress": {"number": 1234,"street": "Boul. If no answer, leave behind the black bin.","refNumber": "shopifyid1234","completeAfter": 1578439750000,"completeBefore": 1578439950000,"merchantDisplayName": "Metro Fleury No 2"}],"next": {"limit": 1,"startAt": "FF4F198RNMV5","createdAt": "2019-10-25T22:56:06.000Z"}}Get Order by Id This endpoint get the order's information.
Authorizations:OAuth2Authorization-Headerpath Parametersidrequiredstring The id of the order that will be created
Responses200 Successful response
get/orders/{id}Development/Staging environment

If no answer, leave behind the black bin.","refNumber": "shopifyid1234","completeAfter": 1578439750000,"completeBefore": 1578439950000,"merchantDisplayName": "Metro Fleury No 2"}Delete Order by Id This endpoint delete the order's information.
Authorizations:OAuth2Authorization-Headerpath Parametersidrequiredstring The id of the order that will be deleted
Responses200 Successful response

https://api-parcel-stage.gobolt.com/orders/{id}Production Environment

If no answer, leave behind the black bin.","refNumber": "shopifyid1234","completeAfter": 1578439750000,"completeBefore": 1578439950000,"merchantDisplayName": "Metro Fleury No 2"}Update the packages in an order. This endpoint modifies the packages in an order. The number of packages in the new package list must be the same as the original order. The weight of each new package should not exceed the weight limit set for the original order's delivery type. For instance, if the original order is labeled as PARCEL, the weights of the new packages must stay within the PARCEL limit.
Authorizations:OAuth2Authorization-Headerpath Parametersidrequiredstring The id of the order that will be updated
Request Body schema: application/jsonrequiredpackagesArray of objects Array of packages which contains the package information for size and weight.
Responses200 Successful response
put/orders/{id}/packagesDevelopment/Staging environment
https://api-parcel-stage.gobolt.com/orders/{id}/packagesProduction Environment
https://api-parcel.gobolt.com/orders/{id}/packages Request samples PayloadContent typeapplication/jsonCopy Expand all  Collapse all {"packages": [{"refNumber": "12345","trackingNumber": "KC15YTWJ0EBV","weightOptions": {"weight": 20,"unit": "lb"},"sizeOptions": {"length": 20,"width": 15,"height": 15,"unit": "inch"}}]}Mark order as ready for pickup. This endpoint marks an order as ready for pickup. Also referred to as confirming an order or fulfilling an order.
Authorizations:OAuth2Authorization-Headerpath Parametersidrequiredstring The id of the order that will be updated
Request Body schema: application/jsonrequiredobject Responses200 Successful response
patch/orders/{id}/pickupreadyDevelopment/Staging environment
https://api-parcel-stage.gobolt.com/orders/{id}/pickupreadyProduction Environment
https://api-parcel.gobolt.com/orders/{id}/pickupready Request samples PayloadContent typeapplication/jsonCopy{ }TrackingTracking information about an order
Get the tracking information of an order by order id or package tracking number. This endpoint returns the tracking information for an order. If the request includes the valid postal code associated with the order being retrieved in the query string parameters, the endpoint will return a detailed tracking response. This may include live tracking information if available.
Authorizations:OAuth2Authorization-Headerpath Parametersidrequiredstring The identifier of the order or package for which tracking information is being requested.
query ParametersshowPackageTrackingboolean Default:  false Flag for returning the package-level tracking info in response
Responses200 Success tracking response
get/tracking/orders/{id}Development/Staging environment
https://api-parcel-stage.gobolt.com/tracking/orders/{id}Production Environment
https://api-parcel.gobolt.com/tracking/orders/{id} Response samples 200Content typeapplication/jsonCopy Expand all  Collapse all {"id": "EBWIVCXADDHW","packageCount": 1,"packageNumbers": ["OKWIVCXADDHW"],"status": "OUT_FOR_DELIVERY","completeAfter": 1668448800000,"completeBefore": 1668481200000,"positionInLine": 1,"location": {"lng": -73.49683816091526,"lat": 45.511423360443466},"timeline": [{"eventName": "CREATED","eventDescription": "Order has been created","trackingNumber": "EBWIVCXADDHW","timestamp": 1668448732000,"location": {"country": "CA","province": "ON","city": "Toronto"}},{"eventName": "GEOCODED","eventDescription": "Address has been validated","trackingNumber": "EBWIVCXADDHW","timestamp": 1668448732500,"location": {"country": "CA","province": "ON","city": "Toronto"}},{"eventName": "SHIPMENT_PROCESSING","eventDescription": "The shipment for this order is underway","trackingNumber": "OKWIVCXADDHW","timestamp": 1668448733000,"location": {"country": "CA","province": "ON","city": "Toronto"}},{"signaturePhotosUrls": [ ],"eventName": "SHIPMENT_PROCESSING","eventDescription": "The shipment for this order is underway","trackingNumber": "EBWIVCXADDHW","verificationPhotosUrls": [ ],"timestamp": 1668448733000,"location": {"country": "CA","province": "ON","city": "Toronto"}},{"eventName": "OUT_FOR_DELIVERY","eventDescription": "Packages are out for delivery","trackingNumber": "OKWIVCXADDHW","timestamp": 1668461252000,"location": {"country": "CA","province": "ON","city": "Toronto"}},{"signaturePhotosUrls": [ ],"eventName": "OUT_FOR_DELIVERY","eventDescription": "Packages are out for delivery","trackingNumber": "EBWIVCXADDHW","verificationPhotosUrls": [ ],"timestamp": 1668461252000,"location": {"country": "CA","province": "ON","city": "Toronto"}}]}LabelsRetrieve Labels This endpoint retrieves a label from an order ID.
Authorizations:NoneAuthorization-Headerpath ParametersorderIdrequiredstring The id of the order that we want to get the label from
query Parametersformatrequiredstring Enum: "ZPL" "PDF" "PNG" "PDF_BASE64" "PDF_LETTER"  Desired format of the label. The PDF_LETTER format fits a full standard letter page with a dotted line to cut the label. Formats PDF and PDF_LETTER will respond with PDF files.
Responses200 The label in indicated format
get/labels/{orderId}Development/Staging environment
https://api-parcel-stage.gobolt.com/labels/{orderId}Production Environment
https://api-parcel.gobolt.com/labels/{orderId} Response samples 200Content typezplpngpdf_base64zplCopy^XA^FO100,100^B3N,N,100,Y,N^FD123456^FS^XZ","textTemplate":"","metadataSeparator":"

originPostalCodestring The origin postal code for the order.If this parameter is omitted, it will default to the pickup location set up in your merchant organization.packagesArray of objects (Packages)  Array of packages which contains the package information for size and weight.Responses200 post/ratesDevelopment/Staging environment
https://api-parcel-stage.gobolt.com/ratesProduction Environment
https://api-parcel.gobolt.com/rates Request samples PayloadContent typeapplication/jsonCopy Expand all  Collapse all {"postalCode": "H4X1Z5","originPostalCode": "H4R2A4","packages": [{"refNumber": "12345","trackingNumber": "ABCDEF011234","weightOptions": {"weight": 20,"unit": "lb"},"sizeOptions": {"length": 20,"width": 15,"height": 15,"unit": "inch"}}]} Response samples 200Content typeapplication/jsonCopy Expand all  Collapse all [{"price": 10,"service": "NEXTDAY","name": "GoBolt Next-Day Delivery","description": "Get your package the next opening day of the merchant (2019-10-30)","estimateDay": "2019-10-30","estimateFrom": "2019-10-30","estimateTo": "2019-10-30"},{"price": 10,"service": "FLEX","name": "GoBolt Flex Delivery","description": "Get your package within a flexible timeframe.(2024-04-04 to 2024-04-08)","estimateDay": "2024-04-04 to 2024-04-08","estimateFrom": "2024-04-04","estimateTo": "2024-04-08"},{"price": 12,"service": "SAMEDAY","name": "GoBolt Same-Day Delivery","description": "Get your package before the end of the day (2019-10-29)","estimateDay": "2019-10-29","estimateFrom": "2019-10-29","estimateTo": "2019-10-29"},{"price": 12,"service": "SCHEDULED","name": "GoBolt Scheduled Delivery","description": "Get your package in a 3h window within the next 2 weeks (2019-10-29 to 2019-11-11)","estimateDay": "2019-10-29 to 2019-11-11","estimateFrom": "2019-10-29","estimateTo": "2019-11-11"}]OrdersEverything about orders
Create a New Order This endpoint creates a new order to be delivered by GoBolt.This operation is treated as a long running task.As soon as your request is validated, you will receive a 200 OK response with the order id while processing continues in the background.Authorizations:OAuth2Authorization-HeaderRequest Body schema: application/jsonrequiredrecipientrequiredobject (Recipient)  recipientAddressrequiredobject (Address)  originAddressrequiredobject (Address)  packageCountrequiredinteger <int32>  The number of separate packages to be delivered for this order, up to a maximum of 20.servicestring Default:  "NEXTDAY" Enum: "NEXTDAY" "SAMEDAY" "SCHEDULED" "FLEX" "CUSTOMER_BOOKING"  The service of the order, which determines the price and speed of the delivery.CUSTOMER_BOOKING is the only applicable option for HEAVY orders.deliveryServicestring Default:  "TO_THE_DOOR" Enum: "THRESHOLD" "TO_THE_DOOR" "WHITE_GLOVE" "ROOM_OF_CHOICE"  The delivery service of the order, which determines the level of service our staff provide when delivering the order.Mandatory when CUSTOMER_BOOKING service is selected.notesstring Any notes related specifically to the destination address.refNumberstring A reference number from your side that we can use to contact you about the order
merchantDisplayNamestring A display name that's going to be shown in the order's label
packagesrequiredArray of objects (Packages)  Array of packages which contains the package information for size and weight.","textTemplate":"","metadataSeparator":"
","type":"TEXT","hash":"LPnZrXJ0MutNlBgo4Rbvsoat7FLb0c/ncxsIfU1oh10="}

https://api-parcel.gobolt.com/orders Request samples PayloadContent typeapplication/jsonCopy Expand all  Collapse all {"recipient": {"name": "Charles Carmichael","phone": "+15145573849","email": "charles.carmichael@gobolt.com","notes": "Do not text, call instead."},"recipientAddress": {"street": "4455A Boul.Poirier","unit": "unit204 - GoBolt HQ","city": "Montreal","province": "Quebec","country": "Canada","postalCode": "H4R 2A4","isBusinessAddress": true},"originAddress": {"street": "4455A Boul.Poirier","unit": "unit204 - GoBolt HQ","city": "Montreal","province": "Quebec","country": "Canada","postalCode": "H4R 2A4","isBusinessAddress": true},"packageCount": 1,"service": "NEXTDAY","deliveryService": "THRESHOLD","notes": "The entrance is through the green fence on the left.If no answer, leave behind the black bin.","refNumber": "shopifyid1234","merchantDisplayName": "Metro Fleury No 2","packages": [{"refNumber": "12345","trackingNumber": "ABCDEF011234","weightOptions": {"weight": 20,"unit": "lb"},"sizeOptions": {"length": 20,"width": 15,"height": 15,"unit": "inch"}}]} Response samples 200Content typeapplication/jsonCopy Expand all  Collapse all {"id": "FF4F198RNMV5","packages": [{"trackingNumber": "RRRIPZUTSLVW","refNumber": "12345","status": "CARRIER_PICKED_UP","weightOptions": {"weight": 20,"unit": "lb"},"sizeOptions": {"length": 20,"width": 15,"height": 15,"unit": "inch"}}]}Get multiple orders This endpoint is doing a batch get all the orders associated with the service account
Authorizations:OAuth2Authorization-Headerquery Parameterslimitnumber Default:  100 The number of results to be retrieved per request.startAtstring The last order ID in the query.Optional when making an initial request.createdAtstring The date of creation of the last order in the query.Optional when making an initial request.Responses200 get/ordersDevelopment/Staging environment

entrance is through the green fence on the left.If no answer, leave behind the black bin.","refNumber": "shopifyid1234","completeAfter": 1578439750000,"completeBefore": 1578439950000,"merchantDisplayName": "Metro Fleury No 2"}Update the packages in an order.This endpoint modifies the packages in an order.The number of packages in the new package list must be the same as the original order.The weight of each new package should not exceed the weight limit set for the original order's delivery type.For instance, if the original order is labeled as PARCEL, the weights of the new packages must stay within the PARCEL limit.Authorizations:OAuth2Authorization-Headerpath Parametersidrequiredstring The id of the order that will be updated
Request Body schema: application/jsonrequiredpackagesArray of objects Array of packages which contains the package information for size and weight.Responses200 Successful response

https://api-parcel.gobolt.com/orders/{id}/pickupready Request samples PayloadContent typeapplication/jsonCopy{ }TrackingTracking information about an order
Get the tracking information of an order by order id or package tracking number.This endpoint returns the tracking information for an order.If the request includes the valid postal code associated with the order being retrieved in the query string parameters, the endpoint will return a detailed tracking response.This may include live tracking information if available.Authorizations:OAuth2Authorization-Headerpath Parametersidrequiredstring The identifier of the order or package for which tracking information is being requested.query ParametersshowPackageTrackingboolean Default:  false Flag for returning the package-level tracking info in response
Responses200 Success tracking response
get/tracking/orders/{id}Development/Staging environment
https://api-parcel-stage.gobolt.com/tracking/orders/{id}Production Environment
https://api-parcel.gobolt.com/tracking/orders/{id} Response samples 200Content typeapplication/jsonCopy Expand all  Collapse all {"id": "EBWIVCXADDHW","packageCount": 1,"packageNumbers": ["OKWIVCXADDHW"],"status": "OUT_FOR_DELIVERY","completeAfter": 1668448800000,"completeBefore": 1668481200000,"positionInLine": 1,"location": {"lng": -73.49683816091526,"lat": 45.511423360443466},"timeline": [{"eventName": "CREATED","eventDescription": "Order has been created","trackingNumber": "EBWIVCXADDHW","timestamp": 1668448732000,"location": {"country": "CA","province": "ON","city": "Toronto"}},{"eventName": "GEOCODED","eventDescription": "Address has been validated","trackingNumber": "EBWIVCXADDHW","timestamp": 1668448732500,"location": {"country": "CA","province": "ON","city": "Toronto"}},{"eventName": "SHIPMENT_PROCESSING","eventDescription": "The shipment for this order is underway","trackingNumber": "OKWIVCXADDHW","timestamp": 1668448733000,"location": {"country": "CA","province": "ON","city": "Toronto"}},{"signaturePhotosUrls": [ ],"eventName": "SHIPMENT_PROCESSING","eventDescription": "The shipment for this order is underway","trackingNumber": "EBWIVCXADDHW","verificationPhotosUrls": [ ],"timestamp": 1668448733000,"location": {"country": "CA","province": "ON","city": "Toronto"}},{"eventName": "OUT_FOR_DELIVERY","eventDescription": "Packages are out for delivery","trackingNumber": "OKWIVCXADDHW","timestamp": 1668461252000,"location": {"country": "CA","province": "ON","city": "Toronto"}},{"signaturePhotosUrls": [ ],"eventName": "OUT_FOR_DELIVERY","eventDescription": "Packages are out for delivery","trackingNumber": "EBWIVCXADDHW","verificationPhotosUrls": [ ],"timestamp": 1668461252000,"location": {"country": "CA","province": "ON","city": "Toronto"}}]}LabelsRetrieve Labels This endpoint retrieves a label from an order ID.","textTemplate":"","metadataSeparator":"
","type":"TEXT","hash":"3EGYu5vvcOmbw/f2/y3EFWnJ8/x5iedoZRkSI++XxQM="}

{"id_":"ca60fffe-ef87-4f6f-9949-fed089a609f2","metadata":{"url":"https://www.docs.parcel.gobolt.com/"},"excludedEmbedMetadataKeys":[],"excludedLlmMetadataKeys":[],"relationships":{"SOURCE":{"nodeId":"457561ae-e4cf-452e-8601-83fc58756e85","metadata":{"url":"https://www.docs.parcel.gobolt.com/"},"hash":"M/EPuS5i4V8HKA2ltcEK+Bw0CnLjLLWvIvj3Agx1CTo="},"PREVIOUS":{"nodeId":"f36e12f3-ce9d-483f-a826-8930a305b11b","metadata":{"url":"https://www.docs.parcel.gobolt.com/"},"hash":"6UE9IgtzL75Rmq2VG3qmCt7iPzb6I2b5v95/y/S2ze8="}},"text":"Authorizations:NoneAuthorization-Headerpath ParametersorderIdrequiredstring The id of the order that we want to get the label from
query Parametersformatrequiredstring Enum: "ZPL" "PDF" "PNG" "PDF_BASE64" "PDF_LETTER"  Desired format of the label.The PDF_LETTER format fits a full standard letter page with a dotted line to cut the label.Formats PDF and PDF_LETTER will respond with PDF files.Responses200 The label in indicated format
get/labels/{orderId}Development/Staging environment
https://api-parcel-stage.gobolt.com/labels/{orderId}Production Environment

","type":"TEXT","hash":"jEbGnRJbQ5WY3d0FDiE0Q0DugX38McAxRT2zvgswkJw="}
